scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env-shell parcel index.html --open -d dist/$NODE_ENV/
scripts.example: cross-env NODE_ENV=production  cross-env-shell parcel build index.html --public-url ./dist/example -d dist/example/ --no-source-maps  --no-cache --detailed-report
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production  cross-env-shell parcel build src/index --public-url ./dist/$NODE_ENV -d dist/$NODE_ENV/ --no-source-maps  --no-cache --detailed-report
